table_description: Represents the list of audit logs generated by Azure Active Directory.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Indicates the unique ID for the activity.

columns.name: activity_date_time
columns.description: Indicates the date and time the activity was performed.

columns.name: activity_display_name
columns.description: Indicates the activity name or the operation name.

columns.name: category
columns.description: Indicates which resource category that's targeted by the activity.

columns.name: correlation_id
columns.description: Indicates a unique ID that helps correlate activities that span across various services. Can be used to trace logs across services.

columns.name: logged_by_service
columns.description: Indicates information on which service initiated the activity (For example: Self-service Password Management, Core Directory, B2C, Invited Users, Microsoft Identity Manager, Privileged Identity Management.

columns.name: operation_type
columns.description: Indicates the type of operation that was performed. The possible values include but are not limited to the following: Add, Assign, Update, Unassign, and Delete.

columns.name: result
columns.description: Indicates the result of the activity. Possible values are: success, failure, timeout, unknownFutureValue.

columns.name: result_reason
columns.description: Indicates the reason for failure if the result is failure or timeout.

columns.name: additional_details
columns.description: Indicates additional details on the activity.

columns.name: initiated_by
columns.description: Indicates information about the user or app initiated the activity.

columns.name: target_resources
columns.description: Indicates information on which resource was changed due to the activity. Target Resource Type can be User, Device, Directory, App, Role, Group, Policy or Other.
